name: diff-lang-colorizer
description: Apply theme colors to diff and patch files

diff-lang-colorizer.header.lightThemeFor.markdownDescription: CSS color of header line text (ex: 'diff --git...') on light themes

diff-lang-colorizer.header.darkThemeFore.description: CSS color of header line text (ex: 'diff --git...') on dark themes

diff-lang-colorizer.header.fontWeight.description: CSS font-weight of header line text (ex: 'diff --git...')

diff-lang-colorizer.header.fontStyle.description: CSS font-style of header line text (ex: 'diff --git...')

diff-lang-colorizer.range.lightThemeFore.description: CSS color of hunk range text (ex: '@@ -20,7 +20,7 @@') on light themes

diff-lang-colorizer.range.darkThemeForeg.description: CSS color of hunk range text (ex: '@@ -20,7 +20,7 @@') on dark themes

diff-lang-colorizer.range.fontWeight.description: CSS font-weight of hunk range text (ex: '@@ -20,7 +20,7 @@')

diff-lang-colorizer.range.fontStyle.description: CSS font-style of hunk range text (ex: '@@ -20,7 +20,7 @@')

diff-lang-colorizer.extendedHeader.fontW.description: CSS font-weight of extended header (lines between header line and hunk range)

diff-lang-colorizer.extendedHeader.fontS.description: CSS font-style of extended header (lines between header line and hunk range)

diff-lang-colorizer.extendedHeader.opaci.description: CSS opacity of extended header (lines between header line and hunk range)
